scripts.README!!!!!!!!!!!: The following scripts work without nodemon configuration file.
scripts.README2!!!!!!!!!!!: If you want to run them remove the node mod configuration file ENTIRELY ⚠️
scripts.README3: If you plan on only running one single file it is better to have the configuration file separately.
scripts.dev1: env-cmd -f ./config/dev.env npx nodemon --watch src --exec "npx tsx src/app-listens.ts"
scripts.dev2: env-cmd -f ./config/dev.env npx nodemon --watch src --exec "npx tsx src/"
